welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Harper Woods! Get ready to soak in the charm of our friendly city, known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Harper Woods has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit City Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Detroit City Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Selfridge ANGB Airport is used for military operations and training.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves regional flights within Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
